definition[0]: to improve your behaviour or work
example[0]: You kids had better shape up, because I’m in no mood to fool around.
definition[1]: to make progress in a particular way
example[1]: Ken’s plans for the business are shaping up nicely.
example[2]: Immigration is shaping up as a major issue in the campaign.
example[3]: It’s shaping up to be a pretty big party.
definition[2]: used to tell someone that if they do not improve, they will be made to leave a place or their job
